searchBar.inputA11yHint: Notes will be filtered based on this search input
searchBar.searchA11yHint: Open search view to filter out your notes
searchBar.menuA11yHint: Open navigation drawer and navigate to any of your labels, manage labels screen or settings screen

noteDeleteModal.message:
Do you really want to delete this note? 
This action cannot be undone.

colorPicker.title: Pick the color of your note
colorPicker.colorItemA11yHint: Change color of the note to {{color}}

cardItem.allyHint: Edit note view will be open, when pressed

header.backButtonA11yHint: Navigate back to the previous screen

notesList.initialNotePrompt: Get started by adding your first note
notesList.noNotesForSearch: No matching notes found for the searched keyword
notesList.addButtonA11yHint: Open a new screen to add new note details

editNote.openLabelsA11yHint: Open Labels screen and select the labels of the note
editNote.openColorModalA11yHint: Open color picker modal for the note
editNote.openDeleteA11yHint: Open delete confirm screen for the note

labelSelection.inputA11yHint: Labels will be filtered based on this input
labelSelection.noLabelsFound: Start by adding a new label
labelSelection.createNewLabelA11yHint: Create new label as {{label}} and automatically select it

labelManage.deleteLabelMessage:
Do you really want to delete this label? 
This action cannot be undone.
labelManage.noLabelsFound: Start by adding your first label
labelManage.addButtonA11yHint: Open a new modal to input new label name
labelManage.labelItemA11yHint: Open edit label modal to edit label {{label}}
labelManage.deleteLabelA11yHint: Open delete label confirm modal for {{label}}

deleteAccount.title: Reset account
deleteAccount.message:
Do you really want to reset your account? 
This will delete all your notes/labels and cannot be undone
deleteAccount.successMessage: Your notes and labels have been deleted successfully

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.subTitle: Welcome to Beyojar, an open source notes taking application that helps you keep your notes organized

labels.title: Labels & Colors
labels.subTitle: Use labels and colors to categorize your notes so that you can find them easily

favorite.title: Favorite
favorite.subTitle: Mark important notes, so that you don't loose track of them

themes.title: Themes
themes.subTitle: Toggle between light and dark themes, based on your preference

welcome.nextButtonA11yHint: Navigate to next welcome slide of slide number {{slideNo}} out of {{slideCount}}
welcome.getStartedButtonA11yHint: Complete the welcome slides and enter into Beyojar application
